Title: Requires motor vehicle safety inspections to include inspection of license plates
Summary: Requires motor vehicle safety inspections to include inspection of license plates; provides that if a license plate is illegible for any reason it shall be grounds for such vehicle to fail the safety inspection unless such failure is corrected within thirty days.
LawCode: Amd ยง301, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the inspection of license plates during the required periodic inspection of motor vehicles
